section.title: 3.1 Installation media
section.para:
Installation media functions are:
List known media
Add a new media
Edit a media entry e.g. Server changed, login changed, ranking
Check media MD5 sums, integrety checks
Delete a media
Temporarely disable/enable a media
View media information (Content, Selections, Packages, etc.)

section.title: 3.2 Selections
section.para:
Selection based functions are:
View selection Files, Dependencies, Attributes
Show installed selections (0...100%)
Add selection
Delete selection
Create/Save selection
Load selection

section.title: 3.3 Packages
section.para:
Package based functions are:
View package Author, License, Files, Provides, Requires, Conflicts, Label, Version, Architecture
Add package with/without immediate dependency/size checking
Delete package with/without immediate dependency/size checking

section.title: 3.4 Dependency Solving
section.para:
Solver use cases are:
What-if view
Or dependencies multiple packages providing the same requirement
Conflict handling

section.title: 3.5 Packages
section.para:
Package based functions are:
Package info in selected language
Query for packages
Select package
Deselect package
Remove package
Update package
View package information Label, Files, Size, Dependencies, Architecture, Installation Source, Vendor
Further package related use cases see User Interface chapter.

section.title: 3.6 Patches
section.para:
Patch based functions are:
List installed patches
Check if patch applies
Check if patch installed
Check patch dependencies
Delete patch
Update patch
